sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège gàiniàn hěn nán lǐjiě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce concept est difficile à comprendre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This concept is difficult to understand.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de fùqīn shì yī míng yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon père est médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My father is a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fùzé zhège xiàngmù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est responsable de ce projet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is responsible for this project.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wèntí fēicháng fùzá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce problème est très complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This problem is very complex.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ gèrén de yìjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est mon opinion personnelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my personal opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shāngdiàn lǐ yǒu gè zhǒng shuǐguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a toutes sortes de fruits dans le magasin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are all kinds of fruits in the store.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 歌迷们在演唱会上欢呼。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gēmímen zài yǎnchànghuì shàng huānhū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les fans ont acclamé au concert.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The fans cheered at the concert.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 来自各地的游客参观了故宫。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Láizì gèdì de yóukè cānguān le Gùgōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Des touristes de partout ont visité la Cité interdite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Tourists from everywhere visited the Forbidden City.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 会议结束后，大家各自回家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì jiéshù hòu, dàjiā gèzì huíjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après la réunion, chacun est rentré chez soi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After the meeting, everyone went home separately.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhùmíng de gēshǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est une chanteuse célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a famous singer.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我需要一些工具来修理这个。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yīxiē gōngjù lái xiūlǐ zhège.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin de quelques outils pour réparer ceci.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need some tools to fix this.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèngfǔ gōngbù le xīn de zhèngcè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement a annoncé une nouvelle politique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government announced a new policy.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个月的工资已经发了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège yuè de gōngzī yǐjīng fā le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le salaire de ce mois a déjà été versé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This month's salary has already been paid.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他公开表示了自己的立场。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gōngkāi biǎoshì le zìjǐ de lìchǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a exprimé publiquement sa position.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He publicly expressed his position.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yǒu gòngtóng de mùbiāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons un objectif commun.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have a common goal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàge gūniang zhǎng de hěn piàoliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette jeune fille est très jolie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That girl is very pretty.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège shǒujī yǒu hěn duō gōngnéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce téléphone a de nombreuses fonctions.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This phone has many functions.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gǔdài rén méiyǒu diànnǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gens de l'antiquité n'avaient pas d'ordinateurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Ancient people didn't have computers.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī míng gōngwùyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est fonctionnaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a civil servant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen de wèilái chōngmǎn guāngmíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre avenir est plein de lumière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our future is full of brightness.
